page.title: 18Girl Guides and Cubs
page.content:
Girl Guides is a Friday night activity for girls. Before you can be enrolled you have to do 8 challenges. We are grouped into patrols. Their names are Swallows, Kingfishers and nightingales. The guides meet at Southwold. The leader is Miss Mary. Everyone is very nice. Clare Trayler
I like cubs because we go outside for searches. We have a shield for the six with the most points. You get points for being good and having clean hands. We only started two weeks ago and the yellow six won both times. One of my friends, Glen Mitchell, is seconder of the yellow six and I am sixer of the brown six. Edward Foreman
